titles.title: A joint resolution establishing a commission to study the creation of a standing international military force under the United Nations Charter.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2953-2954)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 3/16/1993--Introduced. Establishes the Commission on United States Participation in a Permanent United Nations Peacekeeping Force. Authorizes appropriations.
